# Vega_interactive-data-visuals

## 1 Interactive map with zooming and toolkit:star_struck:
[Open the Chart in the Vega Editor](https://vega.github.io/editor/?#-jpfZh2zUplVVcidAAagYySkHIpcwNKb0DCMelePafj4KEt4kJOMS6gk2kUGwkdHXhREkXkhQmOU1TrKYklSVZMUfJA6sZGLNhS3LYFE3Y9AgpCtRHhkL5jjaRQoH6awIlRdpRJqSz0HS6TOK---doNFsgIySGvYO5BKQZ0TLIGgrtQoaAwNYIo+1LIPE9gYUoTBXT5AQKSNE01mxxToPNIhDAA4yDjg1VRgIj44AABJwDSBkVAbIApmm-pnT4B8cowCQBXFRUcr66x7n3aeg9pKUiBPIMyTVFBmQbC6ROAB1aIsQBb5zQDcKEPiw5vxCegAAxD9cMUJ1HBOgtGHcysoTDz9rzMeFd0CvwKJY6xIAoplhijwkp3Cu5BwgIU8401bHYPsbgjWLjxBuLfp462IRaQqG8T1UowA1CYDRKgdYSjKB1hJAWGMCA-qKALKgBijcJlTGkhE-xgSYBmWiQkSgAhwngkidslJIAYlgyYNJJJyEN7HHUSotOd8iHTGVq1X2o8JpB3yTUqx5wKllNKH89QgY5RAA/view)
Showing the number of users in each country (according to their geographical data). Gradient color represents the number of users.

## 2 Interactive pie chart:hugs:
[Open the Chart in the Vega Editor](https://vega.github.io/editor/?#-DzuIzQLHUPjoWiGaBUsy5kAROIaKsvuc1acjo4qax141M3rrNmOznOSCbQp88Slsi9bYu+JVksyA73NcIg1bYsoCgkq8GIyMgGeU9r4QcveqilmHvPm4Lp6NrBbAaJkoA8kuJsMqzmAAIKE9zVs2yB5JmOTcJEurSA+wnNcaJ37UN8Lou26dpm4QPdND+eI9j9X5R68oABKyY0Gy3PPK8qDLVLC0mz3Mk6BxAk8VLQGgFfhmyfJbhS7WlKX9Hvfi3By9InQJ7b2K9JZS3-EKGeah6x7w0AfToT8f6x2ghLABq8aagOru5TyOBu5IKJGwDybRvKAxnMcGqjNZolw5tzcOlc4RSx5Jyeu3Mm7bm5lQ7+c8+7GUXvZEAF9EHcNmvNauj9Z4xwBr5KIpgpa+G8EfdIHs2EpClnIBozNFEvGrAgKwGgGEyGLLyaKNAABeM9j6ZGyPYD+NAdBf1AJYsW0FFBkOON9amqEhZMLrjPFR3NBEgCcafRwD8tEnzPjIK4wkTbBLBg-GJjilFoBGErKWDJVAKAsck9AegFJGFkeQjx2hlBeOXLXFhJt-)
Showing the different number of plays through the whole day according to the radius size of each arch. Different color opacity of different arches are used to distinguish different hours of the day.
